chapter.title: What's New in Spring Batch 3.0
chapter.para: The Spring Batch 3.0 release has five major themes:

listitem.para: Promote Spring Batch Integration to Spring Batch
Upgrade to Support Spring 4 and Java 8

section.title: JSR-352 Support
section.para: The JSR-352 (Batch Applications for the Java Platform) specification has been fully implemented. See for more details.

section.title: Promote Spring Batch Integration to Spring Batch
section.para: The Spring Batch Integration project has been merged into the main Spring Batch code base. Spring Batch Integration provides support for Remote Chunking, Asynchronous handing and so on. See for more details.

section.title: Upgrade to Support Spring 4 and Java 8
section.para: Spring Batch now depends on Spring 4.0 and has been tested for compatibility against Java 8. Java 6 still remains the default source/target version for the Spring Batch distribution.

section.title: JobScope Support
section.para: A new "job" scope has been added, see section for more details.

section.title: SQLite Support
section.para: SQLite support has been added along with database schema scripts.
